dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: ...I mean, how could they not have known about this before, uh, before social media blew up?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...I mean, how could they not have known about this before, uh, before social media blew up?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ранее в социальных сетях появились сообщения об аннулировании ИИН, полученных гражданами России в нарушение законодательства Казахстана. В ответ на это Tengrinews.kz направил официальный запрос в Министерство внутренних дел.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, I think, like, the ministry's acting pretty decisively now, right? They've confirmed it, they're revoking IINs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, I think, like, the ministry's acting pretty decisively now, right? They've confirmed it, they're revoking IINs.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: В ведомстве подтвердили, что в ходе проверочных мероприятий были выявлены факты незаконной выдачи ИИН иностранцам... В результате допущенных нарушений такие ИИН были исключены из национального реестра.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Decisively? It took social media to uncover what sounds like, frankly, a massive, uh, fraudulent operation with forged documents.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Decisively? It took social media to uncover what sounds like, frankly, a massive, uh, fraudulent operation with forged documents.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: В ходе проверочных мероприятий были выявлены факты незаконной выдачи ИИН иностранцам, в том числе с использованием поддельных документов.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But they're saying it was, like, intermediaries, people trying to skirt the system. That's not necessarily, you know, the ministry's fault directly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But they're saying it was, like, intermediaries, people trying to skirt the system. That's not necessarily, you know, the ministry's fault directly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Прежняя практика подачи заявлений через представителей привела к появлению платных посреднических услуг и онлайн-предложений по получению ИИН без въезда в страну, сообщили в пресс-службе ведомства.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, come on. The "previous practice of submitting applications through representatives" – that's what created this whole, um, shadow market for IINs. They enabled it!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, come on. The previous practice of submitting applications through representatives - that's what created this whole, um, shadow market for IINs. They enabled it!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Прежняя практика подачи заявлений через представителей привела к появлению платных посреднических услуг и онлайн-предложений по получению ИИН без въезда в страну...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but they're addressing that. They're making it in-person only now, and they're talking about, like, biometric identification for the future.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, but they're addressing that. They're making it in-person only now, and they're talking about, like, biometric identification for the future.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: В министерстве напомнили, что выдача ИИН иностранным гражданам и лицам без гражданства допускается только при личном обращении на территории Казахстана. ... Министерство внутренних дел завершает разработку цифрового решения по выдаче ИИН с применением биометрической идентификации...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Biometrics? After how many thousands of these were issued illegally? Nine thousand just to Russian citizens this year, according to them. How many of those are legitimate, really?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Biometrics? After how many thousands of these were issued illegally? Nine thousand just to Russian citizens this year, according to them. How many of those are legitimate, really?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: По официальным данным, в этом году в Казахстане ИИН были выданы 9 тысячам граждан России.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's why they're saying each revoked IIN is subject to an individual investigation. They're telling people to go to the police. That sounds thorough.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's why they're saying each revoked I I N is subject to an individual investigation. They're telling people to go to the police. That sounds thorough.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Там добавили, что по каждому аннулированному ИИН проводится отдельное разбирательство: Иностранным гражданам, чей ИИН был исключен из реестра, следует обратиться в Департамент полиции города Алматы для выяснения обстоятельств получения ИИН и дачи пояснений в рамках расследования.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Thorough, or, um, shifting the burden onto the individuals who were, let's be honest, probably misled by these so-called intermediaries, right? They're just the victims.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Thorough, or, um, shifting the burden onto the individuals who were, let's be honest, probably misled by these so-called intermediaries, right? They're just the victims.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Victims? Forged documents, though. I mean, someone's actively breaking the law there. You can't just, like, blame the system entirely when people are using fakes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Victims? Forged documents, though. I mean, someone's actively breaking the law there. You can't just, like, blame the system entirely when people are using fakes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: По факту подделки документов возбуждено уголовное дело.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But the system allowed it to happen for so long! And now they're investigating "digital infrastructure" violations. That sounds like an inside job, if you ask me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the system allowed it to happen for so long! And now they're investigating digital infrastructure violations. That sounds like an inside job, if you ask me.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Министерство также расследует возможные нарушения в области цифровой инфраструктуры, которые могли способствовать незаконной выдаче ИИН.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I think that's a bit of a leap. It could be, you know, just weaknesses that, uh, bad actors exploited. It's good they're plugging those holes with this new digital solution.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I think that's a bit of a leap. It could be, you know, just weaknesses that, uh, bad actors exploited. It's good they're plugging those holes with this new digital solution.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Министерство внутренних дел завершает разработку цифрового решения по выдаче ИИН с применением биометрической идентификации и автоматизированной проверки подлинности документов и данных о пересечении границы. Это позволит исключить посредников и минимизировать человеческий фактор, заверили в ведомстве.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A "digital solution" after the horse has bolted. What about all the IINs that haven't been caught? This smells like, um, damage control, not proactive governance.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A digital solution after the horse has bolted. What about all the IINs that haven't been caught? This smells like, um, damage control, not proactive governance.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, I mean, better late than never, right? And they are revoking them, they're initiating a criminal case. That's not exactly, like, sweeping it under the rug.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, I mean, better late than never, right? And they are revoking them, they're initiating a criminal case. That's not exactly, like, sweeping it under the rug.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: В результате допущенных нарушений такие ИИН были исключены из национального реестра. ... По факту подделки документов возбуждено уголовное дело.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's a huge mess, though. Eighty-seven thousand permanent residents, plus the nine thousand this year, and now this whole, uh, question mark over their identities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a huge mess, though. Eighty-seven thousand permanent residents, plus the nine thousand this year, and now this whole, uh, question mark over their identities.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: По официальным данным, в этом году в Казахстане ИИН были выданы 9 тысячам граждан России. В настоящее время 87 тысяч граждан соседней страны имеют вид на жительство в Казахстане.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They're fixing it, though! They're minimizing human error, eliminating intermediaries. It sounds like they learned their lesson, and are moving forward.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're fixing it, though! They're minimizing human error, eliminating intermediaries. It sounds like they learned their lesson, and are moving forward.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Это позволит исключить посредников и минимизировать человеческий фактор, заверили в ведомстве.
